1010010010111101 1010110110010100 0 -> sum: 0101001001010001, cout: 1
1111011101010101 1011101001010101 1 -> sum: 1011000110101011, cout: 1
0011010000001100 1100101000110110 1 -> sum: 1111111001000011, cout: 0
0110000100000110 1110011010000000 0 -> sum: 0100011110000110, cout: 1
1000010101000110 1000010110110111 0 -> sum: 0000101011111101, cout: 1
0011000000000011 1111101100101110 1 -> sum: 0010101100110010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
